description: Geopolitical tension and inflation are among the "barriers" Salt Lake City faces in its bid to host the 2030 Winter Games, U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Committee (USOPC) Chair Susanne Lyons said on Thursday.
title: Geopolitical tension, inflation among challenges to 2030 bid - USOPC - Reuters.com

description: The Federal Reserve's commitment to reining in 40-year-high inflation is "unconditional" but also comes with the risk of higher unemployment, U.S. central bank chief Jerome Powell said on Thursday.
title: Fed's Powell says commitment to curbing inflation is 'unconditional' - Reuters.com
content: June 23 (Reuters) - The Federal Reserve's commitment to reining in 40-year-high inflation is "unconditional" but also comes with the risk of higher unemployment, U.S. central bank chief Jerome Powell… [+3092 chars]

description: Ireland's cabinet is set to agree to significantly increase its budget package for 2023 to 6.7 billion euros ($7 billion) from the 4.5 billion euros previously available to help offset some of the effects of soaring inflation, a junior minister said.
title: Ireland to boost budget package to fight inflation - minister - Reuters.com
content: DUBLIN, July 4 (Reuters) - Ireland's cabinet is set to agree to significantly increase its budget package for 2023 to 6.7 billion euros ($7 billion) from the 4.5 billion euros previously available to… [+1690 chars]

description: Saudi Arabia's non-oil private sector expanded in June at its fastest pace since September as demand continued to rise strongly despite the highest inflation in nearly two years, a survey showed on Tuesday.
title: Saudi non-oil private sector gallops despite inflation -PMI - Reuters.com

description: Indian shares edged up on Wednesday, as strong quarterly performance from top non-banking financial company Bajaj finance boosted financial stocks and a drop in crude prices eased inflation worries.
title: Indian shares rise as financials gain, inflation fears ease - Reuters.com
